title: Lingua World Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Italian, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe/sandwich shop with plenty of vegan choices, including balsamic veggy baguette sandwich, vegan chili, made-in-house veggy burger (on baguette for vegans) and some pasta specials. Vegan/vegetarian sweets and baked goods are also available. Craft beer. Wi-Fi.
